about.title: About Mirubato
about.what: Mirubato helps you get the most out of your practice. Whether you're working on sight-reading or perfecting a piece, we provide the tools to track your progress and stay motivated.
about.why: We believe consistent, mindful practice is the key to musical growth. Mirubato is designed to be a simple, encouraging companion on your musical journey.
about.how: Mirubato is open-source and built with a local-first approach. This means your data stays with you, on your device, by default. No tracking, no analyticsâ€”just you and your music.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Mirubato is proudly open-source. We welcome contributions from the community and believe in building great things together, transparently.

privacy.title: Privacy & Your Data
privacy.intro: We believe in transparency about what data we collect and how we use it.

dataWeCollect.title: What Data We Collect
dataWeCollect.account: Account information: email address, display name, authentication method (Google or magic link)
dataWeCollect.profile: Profile information: primary instrument and musical goals (optional)
dataWeCollect.practice: Practice data: your logbook entries, goals, repertoire, and any content you choose to sync
dataWeCollect.technical: Technical data: login timestamps, sync metadata for multi-device access

dataWeStore.title: How We Store Your Data
dataWeStore.localFirst: Works offline-first with data saved locally on your device
dataWeStore.cloudSync: Optional cloud sync stores your data securely on Cloudflare's global network
dataWeStore.retention: Data is retained while your account is active; you can delete your account anytime

dataWeShare.title: What We Don't Do
dataWeShare.noSelling: We never sell your personal data
dataWeShare.noAds: We don't use your data for advertising
dataWeShare.noTracking: We don't use tracking cookies or analytics beyond essential functionality
dataWeShare.noThirdParty: We don't share your practice data with third parties

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.access: You can export your data anytime through the app
yourRights.deletion: You can delete your account and all associated data
yourRights.control: You control what data to sync across devices
